about_the_game:
Color the World together!

Mona Chrome has turned everything black and white! It’s up to you and your friend to stop her and color the world. You will be jumping and shooting your way through increasingly challenging levels, working together or solo to find the mysterious Pictorian crystals. Choose from a range of familiar-looking characters, all with unique abilities, and unlock even more as you progress through the game!

KEY FEATURES

Dynamic gameplay

You can play solo, but the most fun you can have is in the co-op mode. In the dynamic split-screen, you and your partner are tied together with a line. If one of you wanders off or stays behind for too long, the clock starts ticking, and you have 5 seconds to get back to your partner.

Beautiful environment

See the world around you getting the colors back as you progress through the levels. Discover the unique locations and various enemy characters that will challenge you in different ways.

Great party game

With its fast pace and simplicity, Together is a perfect game just to pick up and play. It’s funny, challenging, and accessible at the same time. It can be fun for kids and adults alike.

short_description: Together is a colorful platform shooter with a twist. Choose from a range of heroes with special abilities. Collect the crystals, bring the colors back to the world and defeat the evil Mona Chrome. In the dynamic split-screen mode stay close to your partner. You can’t be separated for too long!
